attributes.action: Public inquiry into the missing paedophile dossier
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a public inquiry into the missing paedophile dossier that was passed to the then Home Secretary Leon Brittan in the 1980's by Geoffrey Dickens.

For something this important to go "missing" is not acceptable and the fact that children's lives have been destroyed by people in power - this should not be allowed to go on without a full public inquiry.
